description: {"blocks":[{"key":"2gdv7","text":"This protocol focuses on the preparation of small human liver samples for single-cell analysis by flow cytometry. steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"df6ao","text":"Prepare Nycodenz stock solution (14ml per sample) and place   .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":8,"length":23},{"style":"bold","offset":33,"length":4}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":60,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8pq4n","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4tta7","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"36hta","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"0B1E1640304211EE82D731DF874983B9","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":165}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"b423d","text":"per sample weigh 4g of Nycodenz in a 50 ml Falcon","type":"unordered-list-item"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"9fh0u","text":"add 14 ml of GBSS to the Falcon","type":"unordered-list-item"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"12s81","text":"close the top tightly and vortex until half of the Nycodenz has dissolved","type":"unordered-list-item"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"4qsvm","text":"let the falcon rest on the side on the countertop for 5 min","type":"unordered-list-item"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"6d7uh","text":"vortex again until dissolved completely","type":"unordered-list-item"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"6j4qq","text":"keep on ice","type":"unordered-list-item"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}
